gwtoolset-detect-license-explanation: The MediaWiki template may have a permission parameter; when it does, an attempt to detect the copyright licence based on the metadata value can be made. GWToolset looks for Creative Commons URLs that match possible copyright licences; e.g., https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ matches the MediaWiki licence template {{tl|Template:Cc-by-sa-3.0}}. If this checkbox is left unchecked, the raw metadata value for each item in the batch upload will be placed in the permission parameter.
gwtoolset-global-license-explanation: Or you can specific a global licence below that will be applied to all items in the batch upload. This value can be a free text value or a MediaWiki template. If this field has a value in it then any metadata value mapped to the permission parameter will be ignored.
